Welcome!

Hey there, I'm Andrej. Programming enthusiast with a passion for low-level programming. Currently working as a system admin at Indra Avitech, automating repetitive tasks using Python, PowerShell, and Bash.

I study Information Security at Masaryk University in Brno. In my free time I hike, read books, and shoot analog film.
